content.text:
[@staltzphone](@+UMKhpbzXAII+2/7ZlsgkJwIsxdfeFi36Z5Rk1gCfY0=.ed25519) 

That's a really good idea, I have a feeling I've read about it (or talked about it?) before. In the meantime, I saw that Patchbay's `/posts` was using the `innerText` property, so I've used that and it's looking much less awful.


![screenshot of second iteration of bulletin board forum view](&pgUj2c2XosoWd16KajXNveumSSjs2siE9AIZ4z1C0cY=.sha256)

mentions.name: screenshot of second iteration of bulletin board forum view
